Html:

i can't find it :(
can u give me link ;}

Steps:
  • create a map,
  • create an overlay,
  • add the overlay to the map,
  • create a mouse handler on MouseClick or MouseDoubleClick
See line 26 layers, 112 mouse double click, 185 add layers, 1578 example how to add marker

http://greatmaps.codeplex.com/SourceControl/latest#Demo.WindowsForms/Forms/MainForm.cs
